full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 167 of 228 843 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct 1 A. No. 2 Q. The girl's name? 3 A. I didn't know her name -- her name or her last name. 4 Q. Did you eventually learn her name? You told us her name. Yes? 5 6 A. Yes. Oh, eventually I learned her name. 7 Q. Okay. What is her name? 8 A. It was Virginia Roberts. 9 Q. I'd like to pull up, please, what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibits 113 and Government Exhibit 114, just for the witness, the Court and the parties, Ms. Drescher. 10 11 Mr. Alessi, do you recognize these exhibits? 12 13 A. Yes, they are both pictures of Virginia. 14 15 Q. Are these both fair and accurate depictions of Virginia Roberts? 16 17 A. Yes. 18 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers these in evidence. 19 20 MR. PAGLIUCA: No objection. 21 THE COURT: GX-113 and 114 are admitted. And you may publish. 22 23 MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. 24 (Government's Exhibits 113 and 114 received in evidence) 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018040
